com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform

Class MultiChoiceForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.MultiChoiceForm

  • public class MultiChoiceForm
extends java.lang.Object
    Main helper of the library. Holds a form instance, including all of the MCFStep.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiChoiceForm

        public MultiChoiceForm()

    • Method Detail

      • setupForm

        public void setupForm()
        Defines the necessary listeners for the MCFStep, options listener and title tooltip listener. It has to be called after building the form in order for it to be enabled. Otherwise, form would not be enabled.

      • handleActivityResult

        public void handleActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                 int resultCode,
                                 @NonNull
                                 android.content.Intent data)
        Handles the OptionsActivity onResult. Edit the MCFStepView to show the selected option.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - onActivityResult requestCode.
        resultCode - onActivityResult resultCode.
        data - onActivityResult data.

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Validate all of the MCFStep where MCFStep.isRequired(), they cannot be empty.
        Returns:
        Whether all of the required MCFSteps are selected.

      • getSteps

        public java.util.ArrayList<? extends MCFStep> getSteps()
        Retrieves the current list of MCFSteps.
        Returns:
        Current list of MCFSteps.
